code: import{FETCH_CATEGORY,CLEAR_CATEGORY}from"../types";var categoryReducer=function categoryReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:null;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case FETCH_CATEGORY:return action.payload;case CLEAR_CATEGORY:return state=null;default:return state;}};export default categoryReducer;
